General.Name: Sanjiang Shopping Club Co Ltd
General.Description: Sanjiang Shopping Club Co.,Ltd operates a chain of food supermarkets in Zhejiang province, the People's Republic of China. The company operates community stores, Hema stores, and neighborhood stores. It also provides online sale and supply chain management services, as well as engages in computer software development and consulting. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 197, N. Sec of Huancheng W. Rd, Ningbo, China, 315010
